title: GO TELL IT TO BIRDS, KARU JAYASURIYA TELLS SLFP
content: “Go tell it to birds,” said Karu Jayasuriya, Deputy Leader of the United National Party yesterday to members of the Sri Lanka Freedom Party who allege that the attack on the UNP rally on February 04 was done by the UNPers themselves. Addressing a media briefing yesterday, Karu J. said that the manner in which…
